query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS newsletter_subscribers (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  email VARCHAR(320) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  source VARCHAR(100) DEFAULT 'resources_page',
  status ENUM('active', 'unsubscribed') DEFAULT 'active' NOT NULL,
  subscribedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  unsubscribedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  tags TEXT
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4Hyo2L8cuQnYKpK.root --database grCyd6mifTZvX8AxBen7Th --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS newsletter_subscribers (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  email VARCHAR(320) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  source VARCHAR(100) DEFAULT 'resources_page',
  status ENUM('active', 'unsubscribed') DEFAULT 'active' NOT NULL,
  subscribedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  unsubscribedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  tags TEXT
);
